pages.text: This guide will teach you how to construct paths, link/unlink two points, and fast-travel between them.

pages.title: Pathing
pages.text: For a path to be valid, you must hit a certain threshold of $(thing)infrastructure blocks$(). If your path has too many natural blocks it will not be valid.

pages.title: Linking Signs
pages.text: You will be able to link any two unlinked signs across a distance if the path connecting them is valid.$(br2)To link a sign, $(thing)sneak & punch$() the sign you want to link from, then $(thing)sneak & punch$() the sign you want to link to.

pages.title: Unlinking Signs
pages.text: You are able to break any linked sign by $(thing)sneak & punching$() it. This will automatically unlink the sign it was linked to.

pages.title: Path Status
pages.text: If there is any issues with the path, an warning will be displayed. If the path is valid, the signs will be linked upon finishing.

pages.title: Fast-travel
pages.text: To fast-travel between two linked signs, $(thing)punch$() a linked sign and you will be transported to the connected linked sign.
